item.title: Apache Hop 2.11 is available!!
item.description: After about two months of work on 109 tickets by 16 contributors, the Apache Hop community is pleased to announce the general availability of Apache Hop 2.11.0. A huge thank you to everyone who made this possible. Â Let's take a closer look at what Hop 2.11 brings: 4 NLP and LLM transforms Git improvements Syntax highlighting UI improvements Various changes Community GitHub Issues or download Hop 2.
